Remarks Quantity
Request for Loan 1.Quick Pay is a special feature provided by 3F Oil Palm so that our farmers can get payment for their FFB supplied within 1-2 working days.\n2.Working days are Monday- Saturday (except 2nd Saturday). All public holidays and company holidays are not considered working days.\n3.To avail this offer, there is a Rs. 100/ton quick pay fee along with a flat banking fee of Rs. 15. Quick pay will be paid based on the prevelant adhoc rate. In case adhoc rate is not yet known, quick pay will be based on an assumed adhoc rate, but it will be adjusted based on Government Order rate, as and when declared.\n 4.Atleast 1 unpaid collection is required in order to request for Quick Pay.\n5.In case of more than 1 unpaid collection, quick pay request will happen on all pending unpaid collections.\n6.All deductions such as fertilizers, poles and labour requests that were done against FFB will be reduced from the FFB payment while making quick pay payment.\n7.Complete calculation and value of payment will be mentioned in the receipt in the app. This requires a digital signature of the farmer, which signifies adherence to all terms and conditions.\n8.In order to be eligible for quick pay, FFB payment value should be greater than any against FFB deductions (such as fertilizers, poles or labour requests done against FFB).\n9.If quick pay has already been requested, another quick pay request cannot be requested until the 1st one is completed.\n10.Once Quick Pay has been requested, it cannot be cancelled. Got It
